title: Lisa Armstrong ‘emotional’ while celebrating 43rd birthday
text:
Lisa turned 43 last week (Picture: Lisa Armstrong, Instagram)

Lisa Armstrong was a little overwhelmed with all the love she received over the weekend while celebrating her 43rd birthday, and admitted she was feeling ‘emotional’.

The Strictly Come Dancing make-up artist turned 43 on Friday (25 October) and was showered with warm wishes, beautiful bouquets of flowers and some nice treats from Jo Malone from her nearest and dearest.

In an Instagram post of her sweet presents, Lisa said: ‘Feeling very overwhelmed and emotional…. Thank-you for all your kind words, happy birthdays, cards, flowers and presents… #luckygirl x [sic].’

She had to take a quick break from all the fun celebrations to get back to work on Strictly Come Dancing.

Lisa had to work her magic on the contestants for the show’s Halloween special and shared a backstage close-up photo of Emma Barton’s incredible make-up, including a shimmering red heart painted over her right eye.

‘Last nights make-up for my girl.. @theemmabarton assisted by @summerdyason We held our breath for over an hour!!!! #stillcantfeelmylegs#strictlyhalloween,’ Lisa captioned the snap.

But then it was back to quaffing the champagne, with Lisa later sharing a lovely photo of her posing with her beloved mum Linda Armstrong.

Alongside the cute snap, Lisa said: ‘Celebrating my birthday with mama…. #lovehersomuch!! @lindaarmstrong6220 #shesthebest x [sic].’

Lisa has every reason to celebrate at the moment as she’s reportedly landed a guest judge spot on BBC3’s make-up series Glow Up.

A source told The Sun: ‘When Lisa was with Ant [McPartlin] she very much took the back seat. He was the TV star and a career on screen didn’t massively appeal to her.

‘ut she has been truly scooped up by the BBC and her Strictly family so when this offer came through to be a guest judge on Stacey’s show Glow Up, and it was the Beeb, she jumped at the chance.

‘She’s really good on camera and is a leader in the make-up industry, so it makes sense.’

The news has no doubt uplifted Lisa’s spirits as she’s had to publicly contend with her divorce from ex-husband Ant McPartlin over the past two years.
